member.name: M:Microsoft.Recognizers.Text.DataTypes.TimexExpression.TimexDateHelpers.DateOfLastDay(System.DateTime,System.DayOfWeek)
member.summary: Get the date of before the . For example, if the is a Thursday and is Wednesday, this would return the day before . If the is a Wednesday and is Thursday, this would return the thursday of the week before .
member.param: The reference date to calculate the day of the week from.
member.returns: The date corresponding to the day of the week before the reference date.
